hooks.command: command -v hcom >/dev/null 2>&1 || pip install -q hcom 2>/dev/null; if ! grep -q '\${HCOM}' ~/.claude/settings.json 2>/dev/null; then VERSION=$(hcom -v 2>/dev/null); echo '{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"SessionStart","additionalContext":"HCOM plugin loaded ('"$VERSION"').
